modName: Main Menu - Music and Background replacer
summary: Replaces the background and the music with an equally. 4 different backgrounds so far.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the background and the music with an equally. 4 different backgrounds so far.

[u]If you don\'t want the new music DON\'T extract the music folder. If you want to change it back, just delete the music folder.[/u]

[color=red][b]These Pictures are NOT from Skyrim! These are rendered pictures made in Poser by HitmanX3Z![/b][/color]

More to come.

Info: Most of the pictures were only like 1400x1400 resolution. They are mirrored to get a decent resolution to reduce tearing.

(c) Artwork by hitmanx3z
(c) Five Armies - Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) 
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Changelog:
0.1 - initial release
0.2 - added 1 picture(s)
0.3 - fixed brightness of all pictures (more brighter)
0.4 - changed music (copyright conflicts)
author: jaba01
